price: 45. Nabiyow! Hubaal waxaan Annagu kuu soo dirnay inaad ahaato markhaati, bishaareeye iyo dige ahaan33.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
footnotes: 33. Nabiga s.c.w. wuxuu ku odhan jirey asxaabtiisa: Bishaareeya, oo ha didinnina dadka, oo wax fududeeya oo ha adkeynina.”

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
